#summary Welcome to Servlet Filters.

= Introduction =

The Servlet Filters projects provides a collection of common servlet filters for java web applications based on the [http://jcp.org/aboutJava/communityprocess/mrel/jsr154/index.html Servlet 2.5 specification].

= Details =

The following filters are provided:
  * *HTTPExpiresHeaderFilter* to set the expires header on a response
  * *HTTPHeaderFilter* to set static http headers on a response
